column4: Hi, i am looking for a good C compiler, can someone direct me to the name of one?
ok, i have it installed, but how can i open it? o dont see it in the applications section?
I gave GCC installed, but how can i open it? i dont see it in the applications section...
so where can i get an editor, i need to do some C programming =\
there's gedit, there's nedit, there's bluefish ... there are a lot of choices. What features do you want in an editor?
